column4: RT @USC @c00nbuster1 @espirituJoto Thank you both; Victor was a talented musician and beloved member of the Trojan Family. On Sunday, both the interim President and USC Thornton's Dean sent letters to students and there's a page on Thornton's site in his memory: https://t.co/0r51nH9yUZ
column17: RT @USC @c00nbuster1 @espirituJoto Thank you both; Victor was a talented musician and beloved member of the Trojan Family. On Sunday, both the interim President and USC Thornton's Dean sent letters to students and there's a page on Thornton's site in his memory: https://t.co/0r51nH9yUZ

column4: RT @USC We also worked with the family on a press conference this past Tuesday, and there is going to be a memorial held on March 19th on campus. Thank you for keeping his memory alive. https://t.co/Dg4hlW2BmE
